content: ✨charisma✨ chunky ear warmer a crochet pattern by cascadefiberworks all of my socials can be found here 1 please tag me and #charismachunkyearwarmer if you don t post i d still love to see your creation--you can message on insta or fb messenger you can sell what you make with the pattern you may not redistribute my pattern in any way if you want to share my pattern please use the ravelry/ blog 2 url youtube video 3 info ch2 does not count as a stitch ch1 does not count as a stitch to use a different sized yarn/hook use a multiple of three plus two 3x+2 chains and make to fit considering the stretch and head size 1 https //linktr ee/cascadefiberworks 2 https //cascadefiberworks blogspot com/2025/11/charisma-chunky-ear-warmer-crochet html 3 https //youtu be/wj8pogupm5u si=hz1m0t0gqug4fc27
